question_text: Which of the following may cause a newly installed modular Wi-Fi/Bluetooth combo card to fail to function properly? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Incompatible slot type (e.g., M.2 vs mini PCIe)
System BIOS locked to original card vendor
Installing the card without thermal pads
correct_answer: Incompatible slot type (e.g., M.2 vs mini PCIe)
System BIOS locked to original card vendor
explanation: Slot mismatch, driver issues, broken antenna terminals, and vendor lock-in can all prevent proper operation. Thermal pads are not relevant here.
